description: A unique value renderer symbolizes based on the value of an attribute.
title: UniqueValue Renderer

$eref.description: Options available for the renderer legend.
$eref.title: Renderer Legend Options

___legendOptions.description: A legend containing one title, which is a string describing the renderer in the legend.

___type.description: Specifies the type of renderer used.

___visualVariables.description: An array of objects used to set rendering properties.

$eref.description: An object used to set rendering options. Please see the individual visual variable for specific information on how it is used.
$eref.title: visualVariable

esriDocumentation.additionalInformation: The authoringInfo object is not required with a renderer. It is only used if rendering was generated using the Scene Viewer rendering tools. All snippets provided below show a portion of what is contained within `authoringInfo`. Please refer to the sample snippets in the [authoringInfo visual variable](authoringInfo_visualVariable.md) object for additional help.

$eref.description: The authoringInfo is an object containing metadata about the authoring process for creating a renderer object. This allows the authoring clients to save specific overridable settings so that next time it is accessed via an authoring client, their selections are remembered. Non-authoring clients can ignore it. Properties for color/size/transparency sliders, theme selection, classification information, and additional properties are saved within this object.
$eref.title: authoringInfo

___classificationMethod.description: Used for classed color or size. The default value is `esriClassifyManual`.

___fields.description: An array of string values representing field names used for creating predominance renderers.

___type.description: Used in case of classed renderers.

___lengthUnit.description: Unit used in user interfaces to display world/map sizes and distances

___visualVariables.description: An array of visualVariable objects containing additional information needed when authoring the renderer.

___standardDeviationInterval.description: Use this property if the classificationMethod is `esriClassifyStandardDeviation`.

___authoringInfo.description: An object containing metadata about the authoring process for creating a renderer object. This allows the authoring clients to save specific overridable settings so that next time it is accessed via the UI, their selections are remembered. Non-authoring clients can ignore it.

___valueExpressionTitle.description: The title identifying and describing the associated [Arcade](https://developers.arcgis.com/arcade/) expression as defined in the `valueExpression` property.

$eref.description: Symbol3D is the base class for all 3D symbols. It is used to render 2D Point, Polyline, and Polygon features in a FeatureLayer and 3D mesh features in a SceneLayer. All 3D symbols must be used in a SceneView instance; there is no support for 3D rendering in MapViews.
$eref.title: Symbol3D

___defaultSymbol.description: The defaultSymbol on the renderer that get assigned to features with no value or features that do not fall within the configured data.

___defaultLabel.description: Default label for the default symbol used to draw unspecified values.

$eref.description: Info item for the Unique Value Renderer. Its symbol gets selected if the feature's field matches its value.
$eref.title: uniqueValueInfo

___description.description: String value used to describe the drawn symbol.

___symbol.description: An object used to display the value.

___value.description: String value indicating the unique value.

___label.description: String value used to label the drawn symbol.

$eref.description: PolygonSymbol3D is used to render features with Polygon geometry in a 3D SceneView. Polygon features may also be rendered as points with icons or objects at the centroid of each polygon.
$eref.title: PolygonSymbol3D

___symbolLayers.description: A Collection of Symbol3DLayer objects used to visualize the graphic or feature.

___type.description: Specifies the type of symbol used.

___backgroundFillSymbol.description: Used for polygon features. It can only be used for bivariate types and size rendering.

___field3.description: If needed, specify an additional attribute field the renderer uses to match values.

___valueExpression.description: An [Arcade expression](https://developers.arcgis.com/arcade/) evaluating to either a string or a number.

___fieldDelimiter.description: String inserted between the values if multiple attribute fields are specified.

___field1.description: Attribute field renderer uses to match values.

___field2.description: If needed, specify an additional attribute field the renderer uses to match values.
